short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enlarges the containers of single-media posts in Bluesky so images appear in full size without cropping.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enlarges the containers for single-media posts in Bluesky, allowing images to display in their entirety without any cropping.

Enjoy viewing posts from your favorite artists and photographers with images shown in full size.
